document.full_text: a judge on friday sentenced former new york state comptroller alan hevesi to a minimum of one year and a maximum of four years in prison for a state pension kickback scheme in which governor andrew cuomo said hevesi "presided over a culture of corruption."
document.title: ny ex-comptroller gets at least 1 year in prison
lines_and_colors: a judge on friday sentenced former new york state comptroller alan hevesi to a minimum of one year and a maximum of four years in prison for a state pension kickback scheme in which governor andrew cuomo said hevesi "presided over a culture of corruption."
